{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nokia |model=A-020W |revision=-A |asin= |fcc_date=08/03/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless system, CPE |fcc_id=2ADZRA020WA |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-TI |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYMA |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615DN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615DN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, TR-069, |stock_boot=U-Boot |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.18.1 |default_user=admin }} {{TagLine|WiFi Mesh System}}
*[[Nokia A-020W-A]] - ''WiFi Mesh System'' :FCC ID 2ADZRA020WA (Nokia Shanghai Bell Co. Ltd.)
CPU and WI1 chip IDs are not visible in FCC photos. :"MTK7621F" is referenced in the User Manual. :The CPU is probably a [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT. The radio chip is presumed to be a MT7615DN based :on its apparent 2x 2x2:2 configuration.
===See also=== *[[Nokia A-020W-A]] - ''WiFi Mesh System'' *[[Nokia HA-030W-B]] - ''ISAM CPE'' *[[Nokia E-140W-P]] - ''EPON ONU'' *[[Nokia G-140W-C]] - ''GPON Home Smart Gateway'' *[[Nokia G-240W-E]] - ''Nokia WiFi Gateway'' *[[Nokia G-240W-F]] - ''ISAM ONT''
